title: Back to the Future Day October 21, 2015: A definitive guide to hoverboards, Chicago Cubs and Jaws 19
content: Great Scott, the future has finally arrived! The above date is burned into the minds of Back to the Future fans as the day Doc Brown and Marty McFly travel to in the screen classic's 1989 sequel. Hoverboards and flying cars may not be in widespread use, but as the momentous BTTF date approaches there's still plenty for fans to get their teeth into. From a Jaws 19 trailer to a Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd reunion, consider this your hub for all things 21/10/2015-related - and make sure to keep coming back as we'll update with the latest news, clips and virals as they arrive.
